Current program:
from vpython import *

# Set the length and radius of the pendulum
Length_I = 10
Radius_I = 1

# Create the pendulum
ceiling = box(length=0.2, height=0.2, width=0.2, color=color.blue)
ball = sphere(pos=vector(Length_I, 0, 0), radius=Radius_I, color=color.red)
stick = cylinder(pos=ceiling.pos, axis=ball.pos-ceiling.pos, radius=0.01)

# Set the initial conditions
ball.velocity = vector(0, 0, 0)
ball.mass = 1.0
ball.force = vector(0, 0, 0)
ball.ang_velocity = 0
ball.ang_acceleration = 0

# Set the simulation parameters
g = 9.8
dt = 0.01
t = 0

while True:
    rate(100)

    # Calculate the force on the ball
    ball.force = -1 * ball.mass * g * vector(sin(ball.pos.x/Length_I), 0, 0)
    
    # Update the ball's acceleration
    ball.ang_acceleration = ball.force.x / (ball.mass * Length_I)
    
    # Update the ball's velocity
    ball.ang_velocity += ball.ang_acceleration * dt
    
    # Update the ball's position
    ball.pos = vector(Length_I * cos(ball.ang_velocity * t), 0, 0)
    
    # Update the stick's position
    stick.axis = ball.pos - ceiling.pos
    
    # Update the time
    t += dt
